casebody.data:
Reginald MIMS
v.
METROPOLITAN PLANNING COMMISSION, City of Shreveport, and ABC Insurance Company NO. 2019-CC-0071 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 6, 2019 Not considered in part; denied in part. Insofar as relator seeks review of the August 23, 2018 and October 23, 2018 judgments of the court of appeal, the application is not timely and is not considered. See Supreme Court Rule X, § 5. In all other respects, the application is denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
